textContent:
I hope and pray that we make it till here ðŸ¥º And if you're here then Happy Anniversary to us. ðŸ©·

We may not have met, may not have shared moments together in person like other couples do but we're happy in our own way, we've seen so many trials, either due to time, distance, trust issues or uncertainty still we ended up choosing each other.

Sometimes, I wish things were different, that I could hug you, surprise you with something simple, or just sit beside you in silence. But even without those moments, I’ve felt so seen, so understood, so loved by you. And that’s what matters most.

On this October 10th, I want you to know that I’m incredibly grateful for you. You’ve become such an essential part of my life, and I treasure every word, every conversation, every shared memory. I don’t know what the future holds for us, but today, I celebrate you. I celebrate us.

Thank you for being together with me. I love you more than words can express. I can’t wait to see what the next year of our love brings! 

Happy anniversary once again umzyy ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·
title: Open when it's our anniversary.
